Replies.Reply: I'm trying to watch this! It's the last episode!
Hey you...I wanna audition. I wan... I wanna be a star... I wanna...
Thas a nice pair of jugs.
No. I wan you... I wan you...
Please... I'll never...! Never again!. Honest!... From now on... I swear!.. Not a drop!
Take a ticket and join the queue!
He's doing his bit to save the human race. He thinks it's got a future. Quaint, eh? I keep telling him to get a proper job.
Check it out.. another night with nothing in the kitty.
Take a ticket and wait your turn.
You're going to have to tell her.
... And as the waters rose... the people's need for stories grew.
Don't be a fool! You can't die!
Come on, don't hang about! We're getting soaked up here!
I suppose somebody saves your life everyday of the week.
Too much like routine to bother with a thank you.
Percival St. Antoine della Touraine et Sansepolcro da Piemonte the Third. If that proves too difficult, you may call me Percy.
Geographically, in the Northern Hemisphere. Socially, on the margins. Narratively, with some way to go. And your name is...
Well, we didn't and he isn't.
By his neck. Until dead. If we'd had any sense.
Actually, I saw that trick performed many years ago at....
Let's close up quick while the going's good.
We've done all the shows we're doing here this evening.
No... but they sure as hell like being economical with the truth.
So what was he doing dangling under a bridge from his neck?
Oh dear, was that a rude question?
While you're at it, don't forget the other one.
The viper, the scorpion, the amnesiac boa constrictor. Tony.
And he's going to help us win five souls.
She'd be better off with Anton.
That's even worse than the other ideas you've had today.
You're not wrong... Ah, Percy, what would I do without you?
Do me a favour. Take a long walk off a short pier.
Change the show!? Who the fizzing hell do you think you are?......
Yeah, okay, but what exactly do we do?
That cards! The bloody Tarot cards!
You had some of those when we rescued you.
Please can we answer the door? I can't stand not answering the door, or the telephone, or whatever. It's not in my nature. I won't sleep for weeks if we don't answer the door!
Sorry, I just... I've got a thing about...
Telling the truth... Always a bad idea.
How long's a piece of string? Don't ask daft questions.
Problematical my arse! Come on... I know it's against the grain...
No! Suburban bungalows and all that they evoke are anathema to me.
Yeah, it goes just before the fall.
Come on... I know it's against the grain...
Step up! Step up! For one night only! The Imaginarium of Dr.
Test your imagination! Envisage the sublime. Let Doctor Parnassus be your guide. Discover the heights of Wisdom...
... Or, if you will, visit the doldrums with all that's vile and stinks.
The world is full of wonders, beauty, enchantment, for those with eyes to see...
I d-d-don't know what you're t-t-
I'm n-not supposed to be here.
That's the p-point. It's up to you.
I've n-never seen it so b-big. And the stars...It's so c-clear.
I c-c-can't call you Val, P-
Would you really be happy in one of those p-places?... N-not me.
Why d-do you always have to p-
It's true! There was a sh-shadow on the water, when the lightning flashed...
No! That won't work. And anyway, you d-don't know where he's b-been.
I d-don't like it. It's none of our b-business.
He was hanging under the b-bridge.
We found these in his p-pockets.
With his hands t-tied behind his b-
S-somebody was trying to k-kill him.
We c-can't let him stay with us.
We d-don't know what this is about, who he is, what he m-might have done...
The show. We c-can't do it. It's your father...
For one night only... raise your sights... encounter the majesty, the beauty, the miracle that's in each and every one of you. Take this opportunity to expand your horizons. It's not too late.
P-probably remembered he had a wife or t-two back in Russia.
Thank G-God... N-not a single customer!
Lying through your t-teeth can do that to you.
N-no, keep it. Thanks to you we can afford to buy Valentina a b-
P-please...I'm sorry about last night. I behaved like an idiot.
You must admit... even idiots have their qualities.
Sleep no more. Procrastinate no longer. Embrace this once in a life-
As old as the universe itself, the great Doctor, versed in every mystic practice known to man, and many more besides, will guide you to your destiny.
T-taking you to the heart of your imagination!
Your imagination is a very special place. Doctor Parnassus will make it flower.
No. T-two c-competing imaginations in the Imaginarium at the same time... it's n-not advisable.
The stronger imagination will overcome the weaker and then there's n-no knowing what might happen.
I was screaming as well.   It was t-
You think it's some k-kind of scam, d-don't you?
No... But I d-don't expect you to g-
He d-doesn't want to rule the world d-does he?... He wants the world to rule itself!
I thought you were the c-clever one.
You're a l-liar. You've been lying to us all along. Who are you? Who were those thugs?
So why were they trying to k-kill you? "Again!" is what they said.
The first time they hung you from the b-bridge... right?... B-because you stole their money.
They scrawled something on your forehead. Symbols... Signs...
Ah, there you are, Tony. Here's something m-might interest you.
...Anthony Shepherd, who was arrested last week on charges of...
Don't d-do it. Don't g-go on. Not with him! He's all lies.
All of this is false! It's nothing to do with you! It's all him. It's his imagination!
It's all rotten! A naked lie!
'The disgraced director of the children's charity "Suffer the Little Children, who was arrested last..
...who was arrested last week on charges of involvement in the sale of organs from third world children to wealthy Westerners'...unghh!
I know... I'm not a child.
He's not here is he? He's inside getting pissed.
I shall be twelve on Wednesday.
Percy? How old will I be on Wednesday?
See? Parnassus says so too. Are you saying he's ridiculous?
Yes you are. I'll tell him.
Parnassus is a pain. Okay he's extraordinary but I'm not. I don't want to be like him. I want to be like other people. Like them.
Actually, I'm going to be sixteen.
I go to all this trouble and you leave it.
Why does everybody want to live forever?
You know it doesn't agree with you.
And I'll be sixteen on Thursday, so let's not have any more tosh about that.
You think you're so clever and that everybody else is an idiot! You can't stop me growing up just by lying about my birthday! It's ridiculous!
Is this going to take long?
It'll wait, it'll wait. Another time. Something's happened. You'd better go and see.
Typical! You insist I listen to a story and then you don't finish it!
Put him in the big trunk.
So, what do you suggest, we leave him on the side of the road?

Replies.Didascalie: (to PARNASSUS who is in deep thought)

Replies.Reply: He says you must work... to focus your mind. You can help out front..
Just like the rest of us.
No face. No name. The mystery thickens. I'm going to have to give you a name...
... until you remember who you are, I dub thee Saint George. You can save me from the dragon. George.
You can't go on. You're drunk.
He's never not done a show before... Maybe he's past it.
Charity work? I knew you were a good person.
What were you thinking? Look what you've done. Get out of the way!
Thank God it's only cuts and bruises. I thought we'd lost you.
I don't know what's wrong with him, but if it's about the show...I don't care. I'm tired of it...let the police arrest us. I'm sick of living like this....
What are you doing? Didn't you do enough damage last night?
Anton... I'm the one who wants to run away!
Are you trying to wreck my birthday, or what?
How much money have you got?
I overheard you... He wasn't asking the way.
I want to know what's going on.
Yes, now! I want to know the truth!
It's something to do with that bloody rambling story you were telling me the night we found Tony isn't it?
I don't believe this! It can't be true. It's just another of your wretched stories... A cruel story!
Why do you say these things?
By playing games with the devil!?
filled my head with dreams and high ideals. All that crap! While... all the time...! The devil was right!
It's useless... Hopeless... I thought I was strong, but I don't even know how to run away...
This stupid theatre...!... That's all I've ever known...! I've always believed it was something precious, but it's not... it's a lie...I hate it!
No! Tony, don't get in! Get away!
No we won't. This is the way.
Just like my father. Leave me alone. I don't care anymore. I want a new life.
You did it! You made the right choice!
Take your hands off him!! Stop it!
Forgive me, Anton. I was wrong.
NO..NO NO... Please.. father..it's all my fault. What have I done?...
You little fool! You're to blame!..
So this is to be my choice!!
...a selfish bitch, everyone I love dies...I'm...
Where have you been?... All these years... I thought you were dead.
Billy, this is your grandad. Say hello to your grandad.
I think he looks a little like you.
He's only five. And he's very shy.
She's eight months, and, so far, fortunately, doesn't look in the least like you.
This is all I ever wanted... I know it's not what you wanted for me, but...well... there you go... I'm happy.
Hi there. C'mon in. Looks like you could use a drink.
Come on laddy, cross the bridge!
No, wait! That's the wrong choice!
Hello Parnassus... It's been a while hasn't it?
What exactly do you do here?
Nothing? Really. Are you telling me that if you stop telling a story...
This story... something you made up, a fiction... that the universe ceases to exist?
Incredible. It's just incredible to me that you can believe something that can be so easily disproved.
There you are. You see. The story's stopped. No more story... And yet, we're still here, the fire's still burning...
It's still snowing. The wind's still blowing. Nothing's changed.
Cheer up... I've freed you from this ridiculous nonsense.
Now you can use your powers to do something else. Have fun, travel, learn a foreign language...
I tell you what... You're probably not a betting man but...
You shouldn't drink, it doesn't agree with you.
Tony Shepherd. Little toe-rag. He used to run a big charity. I wouldn't trust him. But then... you don't trust me do you?
I just thought...seeing you so upset last night...that you needed a glimmer of hope...maybe a little bet?
First to five?... You might win.
Now that would be something. By her birthday then.
Things are going to pick up. As sure as eggs is eggs.
Sally doesn't count.    Do you, gal?
Sal didn't get to make a real choice. You were gaga. Out for the count. Wouldn't be fair...And you've got four, thanks to your friend Tony. So... we're even...
Now, there's absolutely no need for that. That's just plain contrariness.
You think you deserve punishment but you're a kid - you have no idea...trust me.
No... your pop would never speak to me again. And that'd be a shame.
Funny how things work out, isn't it?

It's not what I had in mind y'know... this.. Valentina, being the fifth... It doesn't seem right... She's supposed to be the prize, the star prize... not part of the bloody score... And you lumbered with eternal life all over again... What a bummer, eh?

I hope they get that bastard. Tear him limb from limb... But they won't... He leads a charmed life, that one... I've been trying to nail him for years... I thought I had him this time. But, there's always some prat comes to his rescue... Talk about the luck of the Devil.
Those weird markings you found on him... on his forehead... Those satanic-symbol, so-called, things... What's all that about?...
God, I hate to see you like this.
How should I know? You're her father.
You don't go through the mirror.
You're out of control. Ever since your mother died...
I don't want to talk about it!
People must be in their right minds when they make the choice.
Gone. Will we miss him? I don't think so.
Don't worry if you don't understand it immediately.
And so... a glimmer of hope...
You've been sent by Mr Nick.
Don't toy with me. Tell me you're an emissary from Mr Nick.
Tell me you've come with a proposition. Tell me what I want to hear!

Replies.Didascalie: (looking at the card, then to the MAN)

Replies.Reply: We can talk here. Sit down, sit down.
You've come here with a message....
Bloody useless! Mr Nick sends an emissary and he can't bloody remember! It's a bloody disaster!
I am not drunk! I'm under considerable stress.
No! No understudy! The audience won't tolerate an understudy!
This is why fate has brought us together. Don't worry about remembering... It's all the same to a man on a galloping horse!
What do you want? I'll do anything.
You're man's lost his memory! He's bloody hopeless!
For God's sake! Tell me what you want!
What! Impossible!..you've seen the business we're doing.
George... We'd like to know who you really are.
I may be able to help.
I'm going to put the tips of my fingers on the top of your head.
I want you to relax and try as far as possible to think of nothing.
Very good, very good. Yes... Yes, I see... I see... Very interesting.
Alas, this technique has its limitations.
And... you used to do good works.
It's an ancient technique of mental divination, but I'm very rusty and it doesn't always work satisfactorily.
He's ambitious, energetic... a man of destiny.
What are you doing? Please concentrate. We've got a tremendous amount of work to do tonight. A great deal depends on it.
This is my punishment. All is lost.
Our time's nearly up... This could be what we need.

Replies.Didascalie: (ignoring him and with a big theatrical gesture)

Replies.Reply: Thank YOU, dear Lady, you give me strength to continue  Born again, tearful but transcendent, the LOUIS VUITTON WOMAN produces her cheque book and begins to write a cheque.
Valentina... my darling girl. We must do another show! Now! Quickly!
Somebody asking the way. Where's Tony?
There are more important things, at this moment!
What I told you was... the truth.
Remember the woman I was telling you about?.. the one I was so desperately in love with.. so in love that I made a deal with the devil? That was your mother...
... so young. She was everything I had ever dreamed of. I made a choice. I bargained away my immortality. I regained my youth...
You fool! You monstrous fool!    You should be dead.
Yes! Yes! Of course! Of course!
He went with that cow! I'll scratch her eyes out!
You! Gunga Din! What do you think you're playing at!?
I want you freaks out of here. Now.
Fuzzy Wuzzy was a bear, Fuzzy Wuzzy had no hair, Fuzzy Wuzzy wasn't fuzzy wuzzy?
I'll be doing worse than that...now, bugger off!
Alright, I think it's time to move on, folks.
Mum... Mum... I want to go on the wall of death?
But I want to!!! I want to!!!
I want my brother! I want my little brother!
You're in big trouble! You're in big trouble!
Stop going on, Linda! You're not old enough!
LINDA! BEEHAVE YOURSELF! I'M WARNING YOU!
He's been kidnapped! They've taken him! It's that weirdo up there! Do something, Dad, do something!
Diego! Where have you been? I've been worried sick!
And you can wipe that silly expression off your face, you little poof.
And where's your gamer? He's lost his bloody gamer! Another fifty quid down the drain. You're not getting another one! Bloody kids!
It's the fair, but it's not fair!
No, no, start again! Again! From the top! Again! Practice! Practice!
The game! The video game! The one we're in!
What am I going to do?
But... Don't leave me! Don't let me die!
You cannot perform here without appropriate authorization.
It's me. I need some support. We've got trouble.
Where did you say you're from?
Next time I find you doing business without a permit I'll impound your wagon.
..having been brought to the limit of his endurance...
...yet the forces of evil could not prevail, and...
What?..Oh..OK... you can have whatever you want.. just don't..
I haven't done anything. I'm sure.

Replies.Didascalie: (trying to look on top of it)

Replies.Reply: I just... it needs time... to recover.
Not at the moment. I'm sorry. It's never happened before.
I think I'll hide behind this.
Now you are making fun of me.
I'm sorry but, nobody laughs at me without paying the price....ah,ha.
Three tickets for the price of two... That's a fantastic deal.
But being a true professional he tried to keep going, at considerable risk to his health.
No problem...dear ladies. No problem at all. I'm so terribly sorry. I can't apologize enough.
Most of them were coming tomorrow.
Okay, if it makes you feel better, I'll give it back.
Don't be angry with him. He's a little bit jealous. He's young.
That's not difficult... in my condition.
When does the next show start?
He's not drunk. He's got a bad cold....
My God! That's it! You're right!
That's absolutely fantastic! Thank you. Perhaps I'll remember other things.
I mean, the pipe. Where did you get it?
It's not a musical instrument. May I have it?... Please.
Please. Everything's alright. It's okay. Really. I promise you.
Ladies and gentlemen. Ladies and gentlemen....please...
What were you doing to that girl behind the mirror?
Oh, c'mon...we all heard her screaming.
Your not trying to tell me that mind control stuff is real?
Hang on.. if he can really control people's minds, why isn't he ruling the world? Why bother with this crappy side show?
What a waste... Tell me about the mirror. What's the point of that, if not to razzle-dazzle the public?
to five' mean anything to you?
Valentina, your father seems in a terrible state. Is it the police?
Don't say that. What you're doing is important. Really important.
Oh, hello, good morning sir. How are you feeling? That was a nasty bump on the head you got..
Either the style of the show is at fault... or the type of audience. I would suggest changing both.
I'm sorry but.. you're not modern.
This is modern. It works. Trust me, I understand this world.
This kind of mind control. Let's try to meet the public halfway..
There'll be a better class of police too.

The trick is not to hide. Change your colours. Be bold. Go where they would least expect to find you. I think we have been brought together for a reason. I don't believe in coincidence. You saved my life. Now let me do something in return.
This can be my birthday gift to Valentina.
Well... First of all, I want you to give me your money. All of it.
Excuse me, madam. I'm afraid we can't accept this.
We are here to give...not take. We are here to help those in need. If it's money you need, then here it is.
If it's the flowering of the soul you need, then here we are but, unfortunately we are booked solid at the moment. But thank you.. I can see you have a generous spirit.
Cost? Money is no good in the Imaginarium.   This is a refuge for hearts in need of truth. A place for souls to be purified.
Madam, why should you care about time? What are your dreams worth in minutes?
There are hard choices to be made in life.
What about the dreams of the less fortunate in the world. Do you have time for their dreams? Or are you like I once was...do you just despair? Despair at all that is wrong in the world..

...despair at your inability to do anything to change it.. to make it better...I despaired so much at the powerlessness of my own existence that I took the easy way out...the coward's way...I committed suicide!
Please, I'm sorry but, we're booked solid at the moment.
Madam, congratulations, you have been chosen.
Come forward and enter the Imaginarium.
We don't want your money. We want your hopes and dreams. You may make a donation later, if you wish.
This is a rare moment. Very few are chosen. Don't miss this once-in-a-
Believe me Madam, you're the luckiest woman in the world.
If I'm not wrong, I fear you must go alone.
It's one of the rules... One imagination at a time, free from the influence of another.

Exactly. To be reborn, first you must die. All of them have achieved a kind of immortality. And we love them all the more for it. They won't get old or fat. They won't get sick or feeble. They are beyond fear. They are forever young. They are gods. And you can join them.
There's not a moment to lose.
But your sacrifice must be pure.
That was so... I had no idea...
No! Wait! I can explain! Give me a chance!
Did you see me!! I almost reached the clouds! I could have...it was incredible...I was almost there...
I made my choice and I climbed... I felt so much potential. I could have done anything. I have to have another chance...another go...I need this...
No! I just... didn't divulge everything I knew.
Are you going to believe them before you believe me?

Because they're irredeemably bad people, and I'm essentially good. I know that sounds terribly prim and arrogant and self righteous, but I'm trying to be honest. Look, the truth is... in order to get my charity off the ground I needed capital.

Yes, I know, and you're right, but that's the way the grown-up..the real world works. You can't make omelettes without soiling your hands. Or should that be the other way round? Anyway, I - with hindsight very foolishly - accepted a loan from people who seemed to me, at the time, to be very decent and sincere. There was absolutely no way I could have known that they were part of a ruthless organised crime syndicate and that they wanted to use my charity to launder money. I made a mistake. And I have to live with that. I'm sorry. What more can I say?
But, can we not talk about me for a moment.. I want to thank the Doctor for letting me experience the most sublime, inspiring ....

Stop saying that! I didn't steal it! I didn't have it. I'd had to invest in infrastructure. I needed more time. When you run a charity you have to give lots of money away. You wouldn't believe the red tape. The Charity Commission are a bunch of fascists. It's incredible.
Happy birthday. For a beautiful woman.
I overheard you. You only need one more to win. Me! I'll be that one.
No. You're a saint... A saint.
Only Valentina's hand in marriage, if she'll have me...

Replies.Didascalie: (realizing Parnassus is referring to his inability to go into a trance)

Replies.Reply: You must do it! You have to do it!
I'll make the right choice. I'm sure of it. I can feel how right it is already.
Oh God!... Doctor... We can save her.. you and me. I need this. We both need this. Please. The trance.
This isn't right. This is all wrong. Which way?
Stop! What are you doing!   We'll drown!
What is it now?! Can't we just go inside and get dry.
Sustainability's great, if you can achieve it. The problem is, in many cases you simply can't, for a whole variety of reasons.
Look, charity, like poor little Olga...
...is always with us, to coin a phrase...
Ah, there you are, my lovely.
I wouldn't presume to have a 'message' for the Prime Minister...
You look gorgeous, my love.   I knew you wouldn't let me down.
This is a vitally important moment for the future of the Foundation.
Stop him. Silence the little bastard!
And now he doesn't stutter! You see!? It was all an act to get cheap sympathy!
Get off me! What are you doing?

Replies.Didascalie: (lashing out and hitting VALENTINA in the face)

Replies.Reply: Who's behind this!? Eh!? You didn't come up with this all on your own did you!!!???
No! Someone's got at you. Someone's paid you!!!... Who!!!??? Tell me!!!
You old bastard! This is all your doing!
All my doing?... I'm merely the facilititatater, dear boy.

You've been talking to the devil, haven't you? Let me guess what he said... If you manage to kill me, he'll release Valentina. Yes? Am I right?... I am aren't I? It's all lies. He can't release her. And why not? Because he doesn't have her.
You've got to believe me! For all our sakes!
Only if she comes with me.
I'm not going on my own.
She doesn't want to do it on her own!
Let go of her you silly pillock!
SALLY! They've got her in there!
Excuse me but, how does this work?
How long does that take?   I'm running late.
Is that child up for adoption?
I want to adopt that unfortunate black child. It shouldn't be working like this. It should be in school.
Ohhh... What bliss... and I don't even know your name...
Why would I want to go without you darling?
But... Rudolph Valentino, James Dean, Princess Di?... all these people... they're dead.
Thank you, thank you, that was so beautiful, I feel so... thank you so much...
Hi! Hello! Today's special! Reach for the clouds! Discover your true potential! Gift certificates are available at...

Replies.Didascalie: (bending down and picking a flower, he offers it to ANTON)

Replies.Reply: You thieving scumbag! We break every bone in your body!
We want our money or you die again!
Give me your hand  It's MR. NICK.    VALENTINA recoils, drags TONY off the boat.
Aren't you running the risk of entrenching the need for charity by increasingly institutionalising it?
And what's your message to the Prime Minister?
My God! Somebody stop him!   He's a monster! Get him!
There he is! Stop him! Leave her alone. Get him!
P-p-p-lease m-mis-s, there's-s n-n-othing y-y-y-you c-can d-d-o, he-he-he's d-d-dead...
It's your choice. You can stay here and look after mum and dad, or come with me and help fight the giant.
I'll have to think about it.
Does it come with a happy ending?
